Messages.You win by matching symbols on win lines: You win by matching symbols on win lines. All symbols must be matched on consecutive reels from left to right. Only the highest win on each line will be paid. Malfunction voids all pays and plays. See game rules for more details.

Messages.A bomb symbol can appear on the central: A bomb symbol can appear on the central position on the reels, which will explode outwards in a random direction revealing 3 scatters, Free Spin symbols, Bonus symbols, or up to 5 wild symbols.

Messages.2 cherry bombs can appear in free spins: 2 cherry bombs can appear in free spins revealing super wild or super scatter symbols.

Messages.Free Spin<br>Awards 9 free spin and 100:
Free Spin
Awards 9 free spin and 100 coins

Messages.Can appear in the 3 central reels during: Can appear in the 3 central reels during free spins. Substitute for all regular symbols.

Messages.1 to 9 symbols can appear in the 3 centr: 1 to 9 symbols can appear in the 3 central reels during free spins. Coins Payout:

Messages.Dash Bonus<br>The bonus symbol can appea:
Dash Bonus
The bonus symbol can appear in the 3 central reels. Choose from the 5 paths, the higher the number of the path , the higher the risk, but the higher the potential winnings.

Messages.Select one from the 5 paths on the botto: Select one from the 5 paths on the bottom

Messages.the lower the number the lower is the ri: the lower the number the lower is the risk

Messages.Special symbols can hide high prize or d: Special symbols can hide high prize or death
